subcategory.name: Banners
subcategory.description: Marketing banner examples for Tailwind CSS, designed and built by the creators of the framework.
subcategory.introduction: Use these Tailwind CSS announcement and banner examples to add important information and call-to-actions to your website, such as announcements, cookie banners, and privacy notices. These CSS banner examples are designed and built by the Tailwind CSS team, and include a variety of different styles and layouts.

components.name: With button

GeneriCon 2023Join us in Denver from June 7 – 9 to see what’s coming next.

components.name: Privacy notice right-aligned
components.iframeHtml: This website uses cookies to supplement a balanced diet and provide a much deserved reward to the senses after consuming bland but nutritious meals. Accepting our cookies is optional but recommended, as they are delicious. See our cookie policy.
